definitions.name: Ceramics Saucer (Clay)
definitions.description: A great handcrafted saucer made from clay, ready to be fired for quality kitchenware.

definitions.name: Ceramics Saucer (Terracotta)
definitions.description: Great for serving tea or coffee, or for holding small pastries and snacks!

definitions.description: Great for serving tea or coffee, or for holding small pastries and snacks!
